ygData.subject: Re: Magician components?
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you figured out what lang your grimoir is in?
ygData.messageBody:
Have you figured out what lang your grimoir is in?

Devlish wrote:
>
> From: "Devlish" <dev@...>
>
> As a novice you is about to hit research in one level, can someone tell me
> what form (runes, words, etc.) the components for Magicians are?
>
> I know that the Elemental Grimoir is our book for combining them.
>
> The same vendor who sells the grimoir in Neriak also sells some pages and
> books, which I assume are some of the initial 'recipes' for the skill.
>
> thanks,
>
> Devlish DE Magician
>

> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research. Please keep the emails on topic.
